newsitem.title: USA: Desktop Data stake held by FMR Corp.
newsitem.headline: Desktop Data stake held by FMR Corp.

text.p: A group led by FMR Corp said in a Securities and Exchange Commission filing Monday it holds a 11.32 percent stake in Desktop Data Inc, or 973,000 common shares.
The group disclosed its latest position on Desktop in a 13G filing. FMR Corp is the parent to Fidelity Management & Research Co, the investment adviser to Fidelity Funds.
Filings under 13G are usually made by institutions and large investors with "passive" investment objectives in a company. Unlike 13D filings, those reports do not list the latest transactions.
Desktop, based in Waltham, Mass., provides real-time news and information delivered to workers over local area networks.
